snippet: Tanztheater Wuppertal, the Pina Bausch dance company, is presenting “World Cities,” a series of 10 productions inspired by various cities, as part of the London 2012 Festival during the Summer Olympics.
abstract: Pina Bausch's Tanztheater Wuppertal dance company is presenting World Cities series of 10 productions inspired by various cities, as part of the London 2012 Festival during the Summer Olympics; unprecedented production is being cited as a historic moment for both the company and the art form of dance.
lead_paragraph: Tanztheater Wuppertal, the Pina Bausch dance company, is presenting “World Cities,” a series of 10 productions inspired by various cities, as part of the London 2012 Festival during the Summer Olympics.

headline.seo: Pina Bausch Series ‘World Cities’ in London 2012 Festival
headline.main: An Olympian Twirl Around the Globe
headline.print_headline: An Olympian Twirl Around the Globe
